abstract.text: Creates a tensor descriptor with the number of feature channels and data type you specify.

This initializer provides a convenient way for you to configure weights tensors with a kernel of size 1.

abstract.text: Accelerate training and validation of neural networks across the CPU and one or more GPUs.
A configuration object you use to create a tensor.
Creates a tensor descriptor with the shape and data type you specify.
